Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text:
I would highly recommend giving this place a go!
Very happy to have all you can eat ribs TWICE a week and in da hood.
The prices are very reasonable the food looks good - the grilled vegetables side ‚Ä¶

Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text: Great ribs, better than 8 had ever anywhere. Steak and shrimps was great the time before, the steakfries are great as well. Fair price, but would not pay much more.

Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text: The place overall has potential, there are things that can be changed to make it better than it already is. The food is average and the exposure to the kitchen does feel strange, but the staff are friendly. Unfortunately, the place has no ‚Ä¶

Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text: Great food, love the empanadas. Nice location and also available on Deliveroo.

Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text: Owner is very polite and warm, employees also friendly and polite. Some of them are Turkish, so if you speak Turkish, you can speak Turkish when you order. They have a nice terrace toward to street.

Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text: The service was okay not all too good when you are sitting outside it's like they forget about you but the things I have purchased here over time are ranking from mediocre to good. The unlimited spareribs are a recommended thing... nice and tender and good flavour

Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text: Normal small caffe like others around. Didn't tried food here but service with drinks was good.

Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text: Excellent place! Great food, great service, very friendly staff!

Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text: Value for money, non pretentious and great service. You'd almost think you're not in Amsterdam

Name: Tuin van Zuid
Review Text: Best spareribs in Amsterdam. Take the sweetribs. So good!
